name: Pond 🐸
description:
Welcome to POND!

In POND, you control a cute family of tadpoles trying to survive in the wilderness. Solve a series of puzzles as you unlock your way home. Stay close to eachother and protect yourself from predators stalking in the night.

Made for the GMTK Game Jam, we are part of our college game development group, Game Dev Técnico, which can be found here on Itch.io, and on Facebook and Twitter!

The team:

Carlos Marques, programming
João Patrício, programming
Miguel Santos, programming
Paulo do Ó, programming
Patrícia Henriques, art
